content.rendered: This is the Automatic Feminised version of our AK. It was created by crossing the legendary mostly Sativa with a Lowryder that was carefully selected to keep the AK original genetics as stable as possible. This Autofeminised version can grow over one meter in height and has an appearance of a bushy Indica plant with a main cola that is surrounded by various lower satellite branches. This variety can also be grown outdoors with little effort and provides a caregiving grower with outstanding yields in 70 days from seed to harvest.

excerpt.rendered:
70% SATIVA – 10% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 16-21% CBD: LOW CBN: N/A

GENETICS
AK-47 x Lowryder

FLAVOUR
Fruity and spicy flavor and aroma.

EFFECTS
Very body-like, fast hitter.

FLOWERING INDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 500 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 10-11 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a production up to 40-150 g/plant. Very strong plant, long branching. 50-140 cm total height. 10-11 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered anytime of the year as long as the temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: One of the reasons why every gardening enthusiast should try to grow Autoflowering cannabis varieties once in a while is, that mostly Sativa-dominant varieties are quite hard to grow in the traditional way. The downside of many traditional Sativas is that they need around 12 weeks of flowering, some phenotypes can even take up to 18 weeks. With Autofeminised cannabis varieties this problem is solved. It grows from 80-150 cm tall and finishes around 80 days from seed to bud. Like all Sativa dominant plants she can be sensitive to feeding, so be careful not to overfeed her.

excerpt.rendered:
70% SATIVA – 10% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 22% CBD: N/A CBN: N/A

GENETICS 
Amnesia Haze x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Presenting mouth-watering notes of lemon, incense and exotic wood.

EFFECTS 
Like the Amnesia Haze, it has a complex Sativa effect, a light body-stone together with a clear cerebral high and a fast hitter.

FLOWERING INDOOR
10-12 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 550 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 11-13 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
10-12 weeks flowering time with a production up to 40-150 g/plant. Long branching. Tall plant 80-150 cm total height. 11-12 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: This Automatic variety is continuing the successful story of her big sister. It is one of the largest Autofem plants in our collection and it grows up to 150 cm in height, therefore it should be controlled if grown indoors. Outdoors the Auto Amnesia Platinum can show its full potential and is ready to be harvested after 80 days. Because it has the potential to outperform most other Autoflowers this strain is on a good way to become one of the top selling Autofem varieties in our stock.

excerpt.rendered:
60% SATIVA – 20% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 17% CBD: Medium CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Amnesia Platinum x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Her taste and aroma stand out for their intensity and their delicious hints of lemon, exotic wood and cedar.

EFFECTS
Like the Amnesia Platinum, it has a complex Sativa effect, a light body-stone together with a clear cerebral high.

FLOWERING INDOOR
9-10 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 450 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 11-12 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
9-10 weeks flowering time with a production up to 40-150 g/plant. Long branching. Tall plant 75-150 cm total height. 11-12 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: Our Banana Monkey Automatic is a Indica-dominant cannabis seed derived from the cross between a Banana Monkey and Ruderalis. It is a delicious, high-quality marijuana strain of great performance. Banana Monkey autoflowering seeds can even be successfully cultivated by beginner gardener and is a medium-sized plant that performs well indoors and outdoors with any of the available cultivation methods.

excerpt.rendered:
20% SATIVA – 60% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 22% CBD: 0,2% CBN: N/A

GENETICS 
Banana Monkey x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Our autoflowering Banana Monkey has an aroma of ripe bananas and fruity spice when you open the jar and a flavor profile that lives up to its name.

EFFECTS 
Auto Banana Monkey is tranquilizing and a bit of a creeper, as it slowly yet unrelentingly induces a deep state of full body relaxation.

FLOWERING INDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 650 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 9-10 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a production up to 80-150 g/plant. Medium plant 60-100 cm total height. 9-10 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: Bigger Bud Automatic is a super Autoflowering variety with massive yields. It was achieved by crossing Bigger Bud with another high yielding Autoflower strain. The result is an incredible yielding Auto ideal for sea of green and any commercial garden. Auto Bigger Bud achieves a sweet fruity skunk taste and strong physical stone. The Plant will get much larger than standard autos and buds will be tight and compact. The strain will resist disease and pests well. Allow 9-11 weeks from seed. May be of medical interest.

excerpt.rendered:
5% SATIVA – 75% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 15-19% CBD: N/A CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Bigger Bud x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
The flavour and aroma of Auto Bigger Bud are very similar to the ones offered by the best Afghan strains, with notes of sweet fruit.

EFFECTS
Her effect is both physically and cerebrally potent, generating balanced and pleasant sensations.

FLOWERING INDOOR
7-8 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 500 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 9-10 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
7-8 weeks flowering time with a production up to 50-120 g/plant. Auto Bigger Bud cannabis seeds turn into mid-sized, 70-140 cm, marijuana plants with a short life cycle and a vigorous structure that produce large, resin-packed buds. Whether you decide to grow indoors or outdoors, you’ll obtain outstanding results since she adapts well to all environments. 9-10 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: This is a cross between Blueberry and a Canadian Ruderalis. Plants grown from our Auto Blueberry Berry still carry most of the original characteristics, stout plants with flowers that have medium to large calyxes and they show red, purple and also blue colors, especially when grown during low night temperatures. With this autofeminised version the growers will now be able to produce up to three harvests in one outdoor season or have a great alternative to grow from clones in an indoor environment. The plants are ready to be chopped after 70 days from seed to harvest and can grow up to one meter or more. This genetical mixture is a true masterpiece and the outcome is an extraordinary strain that will continue to inspire growers and consumers, as it already did in it’s traditional form.

excerpt.rendered:
10% SATIVA – 70% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 19,5% CBD: Medium CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Blueberry Berry x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Auto Blueberry Berry has a sweet fruity flavour and arome, with notes of blueberry and spices.

EFFECTS
Relaxing, narcotic and long lasting. Medicinally effective in pain therapy and against insomnia.

FLOWERING INDOOR
9-10 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 400 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 11-12 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
9-10 weeks flowering time with a production up to 30-100 g/plant. Short plant 60-110 cm total height. 11-12 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: This strain was created in Indiana, USA. After it came to Holland as a clone-only strain, it became an immediate hit among smokers because of its unique, juicy flavors and its powerful euphoric high. Our Automatic version is very similar to our feminised version but this time we used the Indiana cutting and crossed it with an unnamed Sativa/Indica/Ruderalis hybrid. The result is a plant with a short structure (60-100 cm), which makes the Auto Bubblegum Extra an excellent choice for balconies or where space is an issue. It is ready at around 70 days from seed and plants show an increased hardiness due to the ruderalis influence. The finished product has a high medical value because it reduces stress, anxiety and pain but also increases appetite. Auto Bubblegum Extra also has the unique bubble gum bouquet for that it is famous for.

excerpt.rendered:
10% SATIVA – 70% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 19-24% CBD: Medium CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Bubblegum Extra x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Its flavour and aroma are intense, with clear notes of bubblegum, tropical wood and spices.

EFFECTS
Its effect is powerful, physical and cerebral.

FLOWERING INDOOR
7-8 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 500g/m². Can be flowered at any photo period between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 9-10 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
7-8 weeks flowering time with a production up to 40-100 g/plant. Medium-short plant, with small branching. 60-100 cm total height. 9-10 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: The iconic Autoflowering Bruce Banner #5 is a strain rich with THC and provides powerful, enjoyable effects. Bruce Banner #5 autoflowering seeds can be successfully cultivated even by a beginner gardener. It is a medium-sized plant that performs well indoors and outdoors with any of the available cultivation methods. The easy to grow marijuana plants produce heavy yields of thick buds brimming with intense diesel, fruity resin.

excerpt.rendered:
55% SATIVA – 25% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 23% CBD: <1% CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Bruce Banner #5 x Diesel Auto

FLAVOUR
Auto Bruce Banner #5 has a distinct earthy, wood flavour and a diesel aroma with sweet, strawberries undertones.

EFFECTS
Auto Bruce Banner #5 is energising, gets you into a creative mood and increases alertness. Great for daytime motivation.

FLOWERING INDOOR
7-8 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 450-500 g/m2. Plants reach 80-120 cm in height. Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 8-10 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
Production up to 250 g/plant. Short to medium plants with up to 80-120 cm total height. 8-10 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered anytime of the year as long as the temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: Our three-way crossbreed of Blue Black x Maple Leaf Indica x White Rhino was grown on a large scale. One particularly heavy yielding specimen was chosen out of many and we crossed it with an Autoflowering Northern Lights hybrid. The results are very interesting plants with a superior character. They have a good yield of big sized buds and a medium height. Due to the dense flowers plants can be susceptible to mold but if grown early enough in the season, there will be no problems. Recommended for beginners and experienced growers.

excerpt.rendered:
5% SATIVA – 75% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 20% CBD: 1,6% CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Caramel King x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Auto Caramel King has a sweet flavour and aroma, with notes of caramel.

EFFECTS
Fast hitter, it has a very relaxing body-stoned effect.

FLOWERING INDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 450-600 g/m². Can be flowered at any photoperiod between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 10-11 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
8-9 weeks flowering time with a production up to 60-100 g/plant. Medium sized plant, up to 80-100 cm tall. 10-11 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.

content.rendered: We took a selected cut of Auto Cheese, the most beautifully pungent example we have ever witnessed, and carefully crossed it with an extremely powerful ruderalis hybrid, the same we have been using for the Auto Big Bud crosses. By crossing our Cheese with this selected ruderalis, Auto Cheese maintaines many of the traits that the original Cheese is known for. It’s a truly heavy-hitting hybrid that’s very resilient to both mold and pests. You can expect 40-135 grams per plant, depending on the environment you are cultivating in, while the harvest can be done after 75 days. Recommended for all Cheese fans and everyone that wants to try out some very special genetics that were recreated to a new form.

excerpt.rendered:
30% SATIVA – 50% INDICA – 20% RUDERALIS

THC: 16-19% CBD: N/A CBN: N/A

GENETICS
Cheese x Ruderalis

FLAVOUR
Its flavour and aroma are intense, with clear notes of old cheese.

EFFECTS
Very similar to Original Cheese, with the distinctive stoned effect.

FLOWERING INDOOR
7-9 weeks flowering time with a yield up to 550 g/m². Can be flowered at any photo period between 12 and 18 hours of light per day. 9-10 weeks total crop time.

FLOWERING OUTDOOR
7-9 weeks flowering time with a production up to 40-135 g/plant. Medium-short plant, with small branching. 60-150 cm total height. 9-10 weeks total crop time. Can be flowered any time of the year provided temperature stays above 10°C.
